content.question: The Futurist movement was most clearly part of which of the following intellectual trends in the early twentieth century?

choices.label: The growing influence of Freudian theories of the unconscious
The growing interest in non-Western morals and customs
The growing discontent with the conventions and values of contemporary society
The growing influence of American popular culture

content.answer: The growing discontent with the conventions and values of contemporary society

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
